product_title: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Balm B5, Healing Ointment and Soothing Therapeutic Multi Purpose Cream for Dry & Irritated Skin, Body and Hand Balm, Baby Safe, Fragrance Free

overall_perception_summary.headline: The Dermatologist's Prescription
overall_perception_summary.description: La Roche-Posay feels less like a cosmetic and more like a prescription you can buy over the counter. The brand perception is overwhelmingly clinical, authoritative, and trustworthy, positioning Cicaplast Balm B5 as the go-to, no-nonsense solution for compromised skin. It plays the role of the serious, reliable doctor who prioritizes healing and safety above all else.

foundation.title: The Clinical Healer
foundation.description: The brand's purpose is unequivocally that of a Healer, anchoring its authority in Derm-Validated science to deliver Restoration. This is supported by a core value system of Safety First, where gentleness and tolerance are paramount. This culminates in its positioning as The Medical Authority—a functional, non-aspirational, and deeply trusted tool for therapeutic skin repair.

identity.title: The Authoritative Guardian
identity.description: The brand maintains maximum professional distance, behaving as a Reliable Expert. Its identity is dominated by The Caregiver archetype (70%), focused on protection and nurturing. This is visually expressed through a stark Pharma-Code aesthetic, and the voice is that of The Clinical Authority—academic, serious, and entirely devoid of emotion.

communication.title: Data-Driven Diagnosis
communication.description: The brand communicates like a Chemist, using rational arguments and molecular hooks to persuade. Its unfair advantage is being The Specialist for compromised skin, a position built on a Narrative of a Lab Breakthrough. The entire PDP's focus is on Science Education, using its pixels to teach mechanisms and prove efficacy rather than inspire desire.

benefits.title: Pragmatic Skin Restoration
benefits.description: The functional promise is pure Restoration, acting as a Fixer for damaged, irritated skin. This delivers an emotional benefit of Relief & Safety, calming anxiety about skin health. Buying this product is a signal of being The Pragmatist—a rational consumer making a smart choice. Socially, it's The Safe Choice, aligning the user with the dermatologist-approved majority.

marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)
marker_1.reasoning: The brand's power comes directly from the white coat—'1 DERMATOLOGIST INSIGHT' and 'Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists' are its primary authority signals (Origin: 2/5 Derm-Validated). The mission is explicitly to fix problems; words like 'Healing Ointment,' 'cracked, chapped, chafed skin,' and 'wound healing' frame the product as a tool for repair, not aesthetic enhancement (Mission: 2/5 Restoration). Clinical authority focused on fixing damage squarely defines The Healer.
marker_1.evidence: Healing Ointment... Soothing Therapeutic Multi Purpose Cream... Dry & Irritated Skin... helps relieve... cracked, chapped, chafed skin... 1 DERMATOLOGIST INSIGHT... Madecassoside used as a therapeutic agent in wound healing

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Derm-Validated) and Slider B (2/5 Restoration) are a classic combination for Territory 1 - The Healer. The content consistently supports a narrative of clinical repair.

marker_2.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Approachable (Easy to find, easy to buy)
marker_2.reasoning: The brand's ambition is focused entirely on fixing individual skin issues like 'chafed, chapped, or cracked skin,' not on reforming the industry or saving the planet (Scope: 1/5 Micro-Correction). Despite its clinical power, it's made widely available; an $18.99 price point, a #2 bestseller rank, and over 19,000 reviews signal mass-market accessibility (Access: 4/5 Approachable). This combination of narrow, clinical focus and wide, democratic access defines The Democratizers of therapeutic skincare.
marker_2.evidence: Helps relieve... cracked, chapped, chafed skin... $18.99... #2 in Body Creams... 19,428 global ratings

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Micro-Correction) and Slider B (4/5 Approachable) align perfectly with the pattern for Territory 1 - The Democratizers. The evidence points to making clinical-grade solutions available to the masses.

marker_3.reasoning: The brand's primary directive is 'do no harm.' Claims like 'Baby Safe,' 'Fragrance Free,' 'Allergy tested,' and 'Suitable for patients undergoing chemotherapy' show an extreme prioritization of safety over aggressive potency (Performance: 1/5 Hypoallergenic). The transparency is not a raw data dump but simplified science, explaining the roles of 'Vitamin B5,' 'TribioMa™,' and 'Madecassoside' for the consumer (Information: 3/5 Explained). An obsessive focus on safety, backed by clear explanations, is the hallmark of the Safety First territory.
marker_3.evidence: Baby Safe, Fragrance Free, Allergy tested, Suitable for patients undergoing chemotherapy and radiation, Dermatologist tested

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: The combination of low performance priority (1/5 Hypoallergenic) and mid-range transparency (3/5 Explained) fits the pattern for Territory 1 - Safety First. The brand sacrifices potency for guaranteed safety and explains why.

marker_4.reasoning: The aesthetic is deliberately sterile, using a palette of white, blue, and black, with visuals of gloved hands and minimalist tubes to evoke a pharmacy or clinic (Aesthetic: 1/5 Clinical Sterile). The language and price position it not as a luxury or a bulk commodity, but as a crucial, reliable tool for dealing with skin issues—a trusted essential in the medicine cabinet (Value: 2/5 Daily Essential). This pairing of sterile visuals and essential utility firmly places it as The Medical Authority.
marker_4.evidence: Visual palette of white, black, blue... Gloved hand indicating professional use... Minimalist label design... Soothing Therapeutic Multi Purpose Cream

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Clinical Sterile) and Slider B (2/5 Daily Essential) directly map to the definition of Territory 1 - The Medical Authority. The brand looks like a medical product and is positioned as a necessary tool.

marker_5.reasoning: The brand emits zero emotional warmth; the communication is pure, factual data about ingredients and benefits, like a medical report (Thermostat: 1/5 Robotic). The power dynamic is one of absolute, unquestionable authority, citing '100,000 dermatologists worldwide' as its validator. This is not a peer or a guide; it's a top-down medical decree (Power Dynamic: 5/5 The Deity). This combination of coldness and supreme expertise defines The Reliable Expert.
marker_5.evidence: 1 DERMATOLOGIST INSIGHT... Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists worldwide... Vitamin B5 helps skin feel soothed... scientific molecular visuals

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Robotic) and Slider B (5/5 The Deity) are an exact match for the pattern of Territory 3 - The Reliable Expert. The brand's personality is cold, distant, and authoritative.

marker_6.reasoning: The brand's primary drive is to protect and nurture—'soothe,' 'protect,' 'baby safe'—making The Caregiver (70%) its dominant archetype. This is supported by the data-driven, educational approach of The Sage (20%), evidenced by ingredient explanations. A subtle sense of control and order, creating a reliable system, brings in The Ruler (10%). With a Caregiver primary, the brand sits squarely in The Guardian territory, focused on providing stable, protective solutions.
marker_6.evidence: Soothing... protect... Baby Safe... 1 DERMATOLOGIST INSIGHT... Vitamin B5 helps skin... TribioMa™ as a prebiotic complex... COMPLETE THE ROUTINE

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Marker 6 uses percentage distribution, not sliders. Territory is derived from the Primary Archetype's quadrant, which is 'The Guardian'.

marker_7.reasoning: The tone is completely devoid of humor, emotion, or energy, using grave warnings like 'Do not use on broken skin' (Humor: 1/5 Grave, Enthusiasm: 1/5 Clinical). The language is formal and traditional, using technical terms like 'Dimethicone' and 'Madecassoside' without slang or contractions (Formality: 2/5 Traditional). The respect level is neutral and factual (Respect: 3/5 Neutral). This combination of grave seriousness, clinical flatness, and traditional formality meets the hard rule for The Clinical Authority.
marker_7.evidence: Temporarily protects and helps relieve minor skin irritation... Dimethicone/skin protectant... Do not use on broken skin... Consult a medical professional

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: The hard rule for Territory 1 (Humor ≤ 2, Enthusiasm ≤ 2, Formality ≥ 2) is met. The voice is unambiguously clinical and authoritative.

marker_8.reasoning: The visual temperature is cold, dominated by sterile white backgrounds and accents of medical blue (Thermostat: 1/5 Sterile). The layout is highly controlled and structured, using grids for comparison charts and clear hierarchies for text and icons, avoiding any hint of playful chaos (Entropy: 2/5 Structured). This combination of cold sterility and rigid structure is the definition of Pharma-Code visuals.
marker_8.evidence: White background with black and blue text... Clean white with bold black text and sky blue accents... Minimalist and clinical... Triptych ingredient layout
marker_8.look_and_feel: A purely 'Pharmaceutical' aesthetic that uses a sterile white void and medical blue accents to signal clinical efficacy and safety. The layout prioritizes data and clarity over emotion, resembling a medical journal or prescription information sheet.
marker_8.distinctive_asset_1: La Roche-Posay Logo with serif font
marker_8.distinctive_asset_3: White tube with clean, sans-serif typography
marker_8.distinctive_asset_4: Simplified blue line icons for claims
marker_8.primary_palette: They use hospital-white and a specific 'medical blue' to make you trust it like a prescription. There's no warmth, no fun; it's a deliberate signal of seriousness. The serif logo adds a touch of classic authority, like an old pharmacy, while the stark sans-serif body copy delivers the data without emotion.

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Sterile) and Slider B (2/5 Structured) are a direct fit for the Pharma-Code territory. The visual evidence consistently points to a clinical, controlled aesthetic.

marker_9.reasoning: The messaging leads with the science, hooking the user with ingredients like 'Vitamin B5,' 'Madecassoside,' and the active ingredient 'Dimethicone 1%' (Hook: 1/5 The Molecule). The argument is entirely rational, built on dermatologist recommendations and scientific explanations of how each ingredient works to restore the skin barrier, not on emotional or evocative language (Persuasion: 2/5 Rational). Leading with molecules and persuading with logic makes this a clear example of The Chemist.
marker_9.evidence: Vitamin B5... TribioMa™ as a prebiotic complex... Madecassoside... Dimethicone 1%... Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Molecule) and Slider B (2/5 Rational) are the defining characteristics of Territory 1 - The Chemist. The brand sells the science, not the dream.

marker_10.reasoning: There is no personal founder story; the protagonist is the faceless, institutional authority of 'La Roche-Posay' and its army of dermatologists (Protagonist: 1/5 The Nobel). The setting is implicitly a sterile laboratory, reinforced by visuals of molecular structures and clinical packaging, not a farm or a founder's kitchen (Setting: 1/5 Sterile). A story born from institutional science in a lab is the definition of a Lab Breakthrough narrative.
marker_10.evidence: From the manufacturer... 1 DERMATOLOGIST INSIGHT... Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists worldwide... scientific molecular visuals

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Nobel) and Slider B (1/5 Sterile) directly map to Territory 1 - The Lab Breakthrough. The narrative is one of institutional, clinical discovery.

marker_11.reasoning: The ultimate validator is the medical establishment: 'Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists' is the headline proof (Validator: 1/5 The Board). This authority is used to verify the purity and safety of the formula, presented as a checklist of attributes: 'Dermatologist tested,' 'Allergy tested,' 'Fragrance-free' (Proof: 4/5 The List). Using expert authority to validate a checklist of safety claims is the core strategy of Formula Purity.
marker_11.evidence: Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists worldwide... Dermatologist tested... Suitable for babies... Allergy tested... Fragrance-free

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Board) and Slider B (4/5 The List) align with the cross-quadrant definition of Territory 2 - Formula Purity, where expert authority validates formula safety.

marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)
marker_12.reasoning: While the brand owns signature elements like 'TribioMa™' and 'Thermal Spring Water' (Ownership: 3/5 The Signature Complex), its true unfair advantage comes from its hyper-focused targeting. It's explicitly for 'Dry & Irritated Skin,' 'chapped, or cracked skin,' diaper rash, and even post-chemotherapy care. This makes it a go-to specialist product for a very specific set of problems (Scope: 5/5 The Specialist). The high specificity of its target audience overrides other factors, making it The Specialist.
marker_12.evidence: For Dry & Irritated Skin... helps relieve chafed, chapped, or cracked skin... Helps treat and prevent diaper rash... Suitable for patients undergoing chemotherapy and radiation

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: The priority override rule for Marker 12 applies: when Slider B is high (4-5), the territory is always The Specialist. The product's hyper-focus on specific skin conditions confirms this.

marker_13.reasoning: The PDP allocates its pixels to teaching, not inspiring. Visuals are dominated by ingredient callouts, molecular structures, and claim icons, functioning like a textbook (Depth: 1/5 The Textbook). The clear goal of this content is to establish credibility and trust through proof, using dermatologist recommendations and clinical claims as its thesis (Intent: 1/5 The Thesis). This heavy focus on educational content designed to build trust is the essence of Science Education.
marker_13.evidence: Triptych ingredient layout... Scientific molecular visuals... Dermatologist tested icon... Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists...

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Textbook) and Slider B (1/5 The Thesis) are a perfect match for Territory 1 - Science Education. The content prioritizes teaching and proving over selling and inspiring.

marker_14.reasoning: This product's mechanism is aggressive repair. 'Healing Ointment,' 'repairs Dry Rough Skin,' 'therapeutic agent in wound healing,' and use on 'cracked' skin clearly position it as a Fixer, not a simple moisturizer (Action: 5/5 The Fixer). The target outcome is not visual perfection but biological health and sensory relief from discomfort—soothing irritation and restoring comfort (Outcome: 2/5 Sensory). A high-repair action aimed at restoring health and feel defines the Restoration territory.
marker_14.evidence: Healing Ointment... Repairs Dry Rough Skin... therapeutic agent in wound healing... cracked, chapped, chafed skin... Soothes dry skin

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (5/5 The Fixer) and Slider B (2/5 Sensory) map directly to Territory 1 - Restoration. The benefit is clearly about fixing damage to restore comfort.

marker_15.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Sanctuary (I feel safe inside my own body)
marker_15.reasoning: The emotional payoff is the removal of a negative state—the anxiety, irritation, and discomfort of compromised skin. The dermatologist recommendations provide deep reassurance that this product is a safe and effective choice (Anxiety: 2/5 Reassurance). This feeling is intensely private, a sanctuary moment of feeling safe and comfortable in one's own body again, not a public display of status (Self-Perception: 1/5 Sanctuary). This combination of reassurance and internal safety is the core of the Relief / Safety territory.
marker_15.evidence: Soothing Therapeutic... for Dry & Irritated Skin... Baby Safe... Dermatologist tested... Allergy tested

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Reassurance) and Slider B (1/5 Sanctuary) are a classic pairing for Territory 1 - Relief / Safety. The product sells peace of mind for troubled skin.

marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Smart Choice (because it makes sense)
marker_16.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Standard (What everyone uses; the default)
marker_16.reasoning: Purchasing this product is not an act of identity signaling; it's a logical decision based on evidence and need. It signals that the user is a rational actor making a smart choice, not a fashion statement (Signal: 2/5 The Smart Choice). With its high sales rank and widespread dermatologist approval, it represents the standard, default solution for this skin issue, not a niche or exclusive pick (Tribal: 1/5 The Standard). This logic-driven purchase of a standard solution defines The Pragmatist.
marker_16.evidence: #2 in Body Creams... 19,428 global ratings... Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists... Soothing Therapeutic Multi Purpose Cream

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Smart Choice) and Slider B (1/5 The Standard) directly map to Territory 1 - The Pragmatist. The purchase is driven by logic, not identity.

marker_17.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Normalization ("I want to look like everyone else")
marker_17.reasoning: The social benefit of buying Cicaplast is joining the overwhelming majority. With a #2 sales rank and massive review count, it's the accepted, normalized solution, offering safety in numbers (Social Vector: 1/5 Normalization). The 'tribe' is not a niche club but the mainstream crowd of people who trust dermatologists (Group Dynamic: 1/5 The Majority). Choosing the most popular, doctor-approved option is the definition of making The Safe Choice.
marker_17.evidence: Best Sellers Rank: #2 in Body Creams... 19,428 global ratings... 4.6 out of 5 stars... Recommended by 100,000 dermatologists

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Normalization) and Slider B (1/5 The Majority) are a perfect fit for Territory 1 - The Safe Choice. The product offers social safety through mass adoption and expert consensus.
